err.no-sqlite: No sqlite extension installed, application cant working without
err.config-perm: Cant write config file, change permission (666):

login.invalid-user: Invalid user. Please try again with correct username and password.
login.pending-user: Account not activated. Please contact the Administrator to resolve this issue.
login.banned-user: Account Locked. Please contact the Administrator to resolve this issue.
login.agent-change: You are using a different browser-agent from last session, please sign-in again.
login.secret-change: The secret key is changed, please sign-in again.
login.not-logged: You need to sign-in to access this page.
login.not-allowed: You are not allowed to access this area.

mail.head-reset:
We got a request to reset your Rugby-Assistant password.
To change your Rugby-Assistant password, click or paste the following link into your browser:
mail.body-reset:
This link will expire in 24 hours, so be sure to use it right away.
If you ignore this message, your password will not be changed. If you didn't request a password reset, let us know.
mail.body-login: To login Rugby-Assistant, click or paste the following link into your browser:
mail.generic-tail:
Thank you for using Rugby-Assistant!
The Rugby-Assistant Team.
mail.generic-info:
THIS IS AN AUTOMATED RESPONSE
 DO NOT RESPOND TO THIS EMAIL

err.not-valid: Please, this value is not valid
err.option-not-valid: You submit an option not valid
err.error: Error occur in form input values

h.host-check: Pass check about host, files and directory permissions
h.language: Set application fall back language. In case User-language not match this is the fall-back language used by application. Create your language in directory '/i18n/*.json'
h.locale: Set of parameters that defines the application language. What way to display Currency, Time, Date... Check at Wikipedia
h.time-zone: Your current time zone. Check at Wikipedia
h.db-ip: Valid IP to database host like: 219.122.32.122
h.analytics-key: Key fom Google Analytics, check help about what this is mean.
h.youtube-key: Key from Youtube develop, check help about what this is mean.
h.clips-path: Path to valid clips directory on your server.
h.user-name: At least 4, max 20 letters, numbers, underscores, no spaces
h.user-pwd: At least 5, max 20 letters, numbers, special characters (!@#$%_) or their combination
h.email-on-err: Send an email to administrator every time en error occur
h.secret-key: Secret key unique for this site. It identify this RA site from all the others RA installed. Be carefull to change, all password are hashed by this key!

account-locked-help: Please contact the Administrator to resolve this issue.
change-profile-help: Here you can make changes to your profile. Please note that you will not be able to change your email and user-name which have been already registered.
check-inbox-help: We sent you an email with instructions on how to reset your password. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions in the email.
confirm-email-help: We sent you an email with instructions on how to confirm your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions in the email.
email-required-help: Instructions on how to reset your password will be sent.
pwd-resetted-help: Your new password is ready to use.
remember-help: Do you want the application reconize you on this computer?
user-name-email-help: Insert here your user-name or your email
